column2: Underweight, over-sized tumors on both right and left side. Hunched, lethargic.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumors
Skull was intact, lungs looked normal but heart was enlarged. Liver had "spots" on it and gallbladder was enlarged.
Two tumor chunks frozen, no cell line attempted
